Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Although both domains of the VHL protein contribute to regulation of CA12 expression , the elongin binding domain alone could effectively regulate CA9 expression .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| CA12 expression |
| CA9 expression |

The paragraph is not explicitly mentioning any diseases, but it is discussing the regulation of two specific proteins, CA12 and CA9. Therefore, these proteins are considered as the disease entities in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| CA12 expression |
| CA9 expression |

The paragraph is discussing the regulation of CA12 and CA9 expressions, which are the valid disease entities in this context. The VHL protein and its domains are not considered diseases, but rather proteins involved in the regulation of the mentioned expressions.
